As you know, I returned from Indonesia yesterday evening. It is a country in Indonesia, the Pacific and 12 hours by plane. http://twitpic.com/4hyqpt
Many say that the Turks reached the Indonesian islands in 1538 and that http://twitpic.com/4hyrbn
he does not know that he was trying to help the people against Portugal's then invasion.
In the following years, there were very close relations between the Turks and the Sultan of Ace at that time, and such that http://twitpic.com/4hysds
They want to be subjected to the Ottoman State in 1800's years. For this reason, in the camels of Aceh, Friday hut is still being read on behalf of the Turks.
Where we can go by plane in 12 hours, think about what difficulties our ancestors went with at that time http://twitpic.com/4hyu4f
people are really amazed.
I therefore advise young people to always read history.
